articles.content: ST. LOUIS -- The Colorado Avalanche eliminated the St. Louis Blues in Game 6 of their Western Conference series Friday night thanks to a critical save -- not from goalie Darcy Kuemper but on a "heroi… [+1778 chars]

articles.title: NCAA West Preliminary: 6 from BYU, 1 from UVU qualify for NCAA championships - Deseret News
articles.description: Adam Bunker became the fourth Utah Valley University track athlete to qualify for the national championships in the 3,000-meter steeplechase.
articles.content:
It was another big performance for No. 9 BYU mens track and field.
